use-cases.description: The user selects data (bridges and projects) and traffic data from the Pontis database to generate a map display, or the user selects items from a map and sees the supporting information.
use-cases.success-end-condition: The selected information, including traffic data, is displayed on the screen or a map is generated showing the details.

functional-requirements.description: The system shall provide the ability to overlay traffic data onto the map display to assist in decision making regarding traffic impacts on bridges.
The system shall allow the user to filter and display traffic data in conjunction with bridge and project data in the map display.

non-functional-requirements.description: The map display shall have a user-friendly interface consistent with the overall application design, allowing intuitive access to traffic data.
The system shall be capable of integrating and displaying traffic data within 5 seconds of selection.
The traffic data overlay functionality shall be available 99.9% of the time to ensure reliability for decision making.
